summary: The Contoso Wireless phone is a great all-in-one device that features a powerful processor, 5G connectivity, a high-resolution camera, and an expansive 6.5 inch display. It comes with several plans including unlimited talk and text, unlimited data with no data cap, and a family plan. Additionally, customers get access to the Contoso Rewards program, 24/7 customer service line, a 30-day satisfaction guarantee, and device protection plans. Customers can also transfer their current phone number over to the new device.
